thread.section_title: Classificações sobre a LisbonAirportTransfersTO | Comentários de clientes da LisbonAirportTransfersTO | lisbonairporttransfersto.com
thread.title: Tonia

author: Tonia
title: Tonia
text: I had seen the good reviews and presumed they were for punctuality and pleasantness. Not only was the lady who collected us smiley and welcoming- she talked to us for the whole transfer about places to see and eat in Lisbon as well as giving us the history and upto date information on the areas we passed through. None of the members of our group had ever experienced such an informative, enjoyable and enthusiastic transfer to a hotel. I cannot rate this company ( and especially our wonderful driver) highly enough. Many thanks
